      • of

        public <T> T of(java.lang.Class<T> controllerType)
        Description copied from interface: PageResult
        Render the default view of given logic, without executing the logic. Ex: result.use(page()).of(ClientsController.class).list(); will render the view /WEB-INF/jsp/clients/list.jsp without calling list method.
        Specified by:
        of in interface PageResult
